mapper.insert: insert into award_team ( book_id, user_id, user_role, contribution ) values ( #{book_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_role}, #{contribution} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name name,u.department_id department_id, t.user_role user_role, t.contribution contribution FROM user u, book b, book_team t WHERE b.book_id = #{book_id} and b.book_id = t.book_id and t.user_id = u.user_id
